storyInfo: Team Rainbow is determined to resolve the crisis in Long Spring, once and for all. After deploying their tactics, they split their forces in two, and Operator Ash leads her team into the mines to eliminate the source of the problem.

attributes.content: Wretched thing.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Boss, what are we gonna do?
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: I think we better fall back.
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Fall back? We haven't lost yet.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: We already wiped out the guardsmen, we just need to wait for the right time to counterattack.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: A couple Rhodes Island mercs are no big deal.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Where's my egghead?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Where's anybody?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: What's that smell?
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: What happened to the guys we had watching him?
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Looks like you're in a tough spot, my friend.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Let me guess, even with my mighty Originium creations, you still failed.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: To be honest, I'm not the least bit surprised.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: I don't have time for your sarcasm.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Well, knowing what I know of you, you're here to ask me for new toys... No wonder your father doesn't like you.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Enough bullshit, I need...
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Are you talking to me, sir?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Because I think you forgot the magic word.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You're asking for my help. Was that the proper attitude?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Are you screwing with me...?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Do I look like I'm joking?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Oh, this old geezer needs a beating!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Aaaahh!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: What is this?! What is this?!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: My head! My head's... gonna explode... it's...
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: You! What have you done?!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You apes really have nothing of value beyond your brute strength.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: And you, sir, do you really think you can keep science locked up in here with this bunch of mentally deficient clods?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Go, and tell our grand old sponsor to settle down.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Gaa...
attributes.name: Originiutant Infected

attributes.content: Guh...
attributes.name: Originiutant Infected

attributes.content: What the hell are those...??
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You can't tell? They're your men.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Of course, they've become so much more now. Much more obedient.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: And soon, you'll be just like them.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Why can you control them? You know no Originium Arts!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Only Originium Arts can control them? You people are so blinkered.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Have you ever thought about why 'Originium Arts' can control those 'infected creatures'?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Of course, you, with your tiny brain, can never figure it out.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.text: The mad scientist rolls up a sleeve.
A swollen Originium lump is twitching under his arm.
As if it were alive, having its own mind.

attributes.content: As long as you become a part of them, naturally you can communicate with them. We are having a good time together.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You're such a hopeless lunatic...
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I'm a member of the House of Tulla! I'm the successor to the Elder bloodline of the Tulla family.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: It's a death sentence to murder a noble on land that belongs to the Lord Ameer of Bayalir.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Lord Ameer? Noble? Bloodline?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Ahahahahaha...
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You amuse me, Mr. Drudge.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: But I'm tired of this joke.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: 'I do not hate the pig, I hate only the golden crown that hangs above.'
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: In my homeland, the cardinals were burned, kings were hanged, emperors beheaded, every vestige of the old order smashed to pieces to ensure none would ever again fear the so-called 'nobility.'
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What Lord Ameer? What bloodline?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You are nothing to me.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: The stinking sack of meat that is your body is even less useful than those of the Oripathy sufferers.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What do you call them again?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Oh yes, the Infected.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: The Infected have contributed to my experiments. But what have you done?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Your status has no value to me. And your lack of foresight is baffling.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Useless trash.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Such a vile, stupid, evil thing still calls itself 'noble'?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Tell me, what part of you is noble?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Anyway, you have nothing to worry about. I have no interest in your rotten worldview... I am a scientist. I pursue only objective truth.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Science treats all people equally. It won't change a bit because of your background.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Nobles and commoners are the same, on the operating table. The scalpel cuts skin just as well. Your contribution is identical.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Considering you specifically, once you donate your body to science, you will no doubt be slightly more noble than you are now.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You should feel honored.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You despicable traitor!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Traitor? Traitor?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Ahahahahaha...
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You raised your hand against your very own sister. You betrayed your flesh and blood. You colluded with foreign mercenaries to plunder your father's wealth. You betrayed the country that birthed and raised you.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: And you still have the gall to call me traitor?
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: You won't get away. You have no idea what the forces behind me are doing.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: They're the ones who came up with all your research funding for the last six months. If you betray me now, you're betraying them too.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: The people of Volwotkeczynski will hunt you to the ends of the world. They will kill you!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: There's nowhere you can run.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: That, I will handle. Don't you worry.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: Goodbye, imbecile.
attributes.name: Levi

attributes.content: What's with the getup?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: I found it in the Lord's storehouse. It looks good.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: ...Yeah, it sure does.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: This is the craziest battle plan I've ever heard.
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: Very convincing.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: How do you know an Originium explosion will draw the monsters out of the ground?
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: All I can say is it's thanks to the doctor.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The monsters have been obeying the casters all this time, except that one night. I realized those wild monsters were actually chasing the scattered Originium shards.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: So you decided this is the way to go?
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: It's kind of a gamble, actually.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Where did you get this Originium engine?
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: ...Well... some things happened, and, I guess, we ended up with a car.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: ...it looks awfully familiar.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...isn't it the one we lost?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Let's not worry about that now. Hah.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: What about the mine?
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: That mercenary we caught basically gave out everything. The factory your brother used to produce monsters is located deep inside the mine. I even think he probably hasn't given up yet.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Ah... That makes sense.
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: If we bait the monsters out here, Cohen will have a chance to bring her people down there and blow the *profanity* thing up.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Just as simple as that.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Doesn't sound simple though...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: This plan seems to be full of the unexpected and far from seamless.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: But I like this kind of plan, where battling is the only solution.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: If even Rangers says so...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: All right, friends. Take your places.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: If all goes according to plan, firing up the Originium engine will get a whole bunch of monsters coming at us.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: And we're in for a tough fight.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: And thank you, Rhodes Islanders... for choosing to stay and help.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. It's my job to clear out contaminated wildlife.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Is that unpaid work?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You're so annoying!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: ...Thank you... I don't know how to express my gratitude...
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: Let's save the thanks for later.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Alright. If there are no further questions...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.text: The Originium engine chugs out a steady sound, with thick smoke rising up and flames lighting up the sky.

attributes.content: Here they come...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Too many?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: How many? Over a hundred?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: No, probably more...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: No... there are even more coming.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: We can only hope Cohen is doing okay.
attributes.name: Tachanka
